<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sudden Mindfulness](/Feats.aspx?ID=4002) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vanara" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=368" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 55</row>

**Trigger**
You roll a success on a saving throw against an effect that would make you [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14) or [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7).

</column>

---

Your mind retains full awareness despite the best attempts of others, and your focus throws others off-balance. You get a critical success on the triggering saving throw, and if the triggering effect was caused by a creature, that creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to you until the end of your next turn.
name: Sudden Mindfulness
